moves.1. e4 c5: Sicilian defence I like this opening
moves.2. Nf3 e6 3. Nc3 a6: Maybe a wasted move, but I don't like White bishop on b5 when I play d6
moves.6. Bd3: I think better move would be Bc4.
moves.6... Nc6 7. Be3: I don't know why my opponent didn't castle.
moves.7... Nf6 8. f4: I think this move was to early. I think that is better when doing this move after castling (my opinion).
moves.8... Qb6: This move turned game into my advance. I'm attacking b2, and Knight on d4 whit my Q and Knight on c6.
moves.9. Be2: Bad move. I think the best move would be 9. Nxc6 Qxc6 removing the danger on b2. Also 10. Nb5 is putting me in danger, if 10. ....axb5 11. Bxb5 pinning my Q whit King.
moves.9... Qxb2: Now the Knight on c3 is lost. I think the best way of losing it would be 10. Na4 Qb4+ 11. ....Qxa4.
moves.10. Rb1 Qxc3+ 11. Kf1: This is also bad move. Losing the rights to castle, and also losing Bishop on e2. The best move would be 11. Qd2 blocking the check and putting my Q in danger.
moves.11... Qxe3 12. Nxc6 Nxe4: Now my opponent is in trouble. Only one move saves him from checkmate.
moves.13... Nd2+: I could exchange Q in this move and do this move one move later, but I didn't, because my opponent was making mistakes in this game, and I was hoping for another one :). 14. Qxd2 Qxd2.
moves.14. Ke1: Well he didn't make another mistake :(
moves.14... Qxd4 15. Nxd4 Nxb1: And now I think the game is over.
moves.16. Bd3 Nc3 17. a3 d5: Opening the way for my black Bishop, and closing down the opponent white Bishop.
